name: XCleverBot
short_description:
CleverBot is an Artificial Intelligence chatterbot developed by the Google, in order to attempt passing a Turing-Test of Intelligence.  

XCleverBot is an attempt to create an open-source project for a chat-bot with similar functionality.

Please note, I have no idea about the CleverBot's source code. This is how I imagined the CleverBot to work. Furthermore, this bot has been trained by CleverBot itself.

Advantage of this program is that XCleverBot can load ANY TEXT FILE and let you talk with it. You can load a book from your favourite writer, and talk to it. This is something that CleverBot cannot do at all. Furthermore, I found that some responses are more superior to CleverBot's responses, but you can be the judge.
